attributes.action: Keep John Bercow as Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.background: As part of a vicious campaign against the Speaker of the House of Commons, John Bercow, MPs are attempting to force him out of his position, accusing him of not standing up to bullies. However, his honourable service in the HOC proves otherwise, and he should not be forced out in such a manner.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes petitions calling for someone to be given, to keep, or to lose their job.
